channel.title: work from home on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in work from home on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: XR development from home
item.description: Covid19 has challenged the way we eat, the way we commute, the way we socialize, and the way we work. In short, it impacted the way we live. More than a million people got infected and the number is growing exponentially, it has impacted the whole world. We need to find new ways of life and change our focus and priorities to save nature and humanity. Technology can play a great role in coping with it.
